description: Enterprise techniques used by netsh, ATT&CK software S0108 v1.1
name: netsh (S0108)

techniques.comment: netsh can be used as a persistence proxy technique to execute a helper DLL when netsh.exe is executed.[4]
netsh can be used to disable local firewall settings.[1][2]
netsh can be used to set up a proxy tunnel to allow remote host access to an infected host.[3]
netsh can be used to discover system firewall settings.[1][2]
